title: 拔剑刀mod用不了

txt_content: 我下载的到拔剑刀mod file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/1154443867/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/EN4FSG8D~2W6SS_MR%7D]X%25%25Q.jpg    我拖入mods文件夹，打开游戏就秒退，听说打怪很爽。怎么办啊。{:10_503:}
